doc.field: New-York Historical Society bequests, gifts and related matters
New-York Historical Society bequests, gifts and related matters
Lafayette Camp No. 140, Sons of Union Veterans of the Civil War, Department of New York
Lafayette Camp No. 140, Sons of Union Veterans of the Civil War, Department of New York

Gift of a vase presented to Lafayette Post No. 140 by Bartholdi in 1887 (1923). Loan (1930) and return (1968) of a chair purportedly used by Lafayette during the Revolutionary War. Gift of a flag presented to Camp No. 140 by William Tecumseh Sherman in 1889 (1931).
New-York Historical Society bequests, gifts and related matters
